quotes.sentence: I love you the more in that I believe you had liked me for my own sake and for nothing else.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.sentence: But man is not made for defeat. A man can be destroyed but not defeated.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.sentence: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.sentence: There is nothing permanent except change.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.sentence: You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.sentence: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.sentence: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. The fears are paper tigers. You can do anything you decide to do.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.sentence: Do not mind anything that anyone tells you about anyone else. Judge everyone and everything for yourself.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.sentence: Learning never exhausts the mind.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.sentence: All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.sentence: The only journey is the one within.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.sentence: Good judgment comes from experience, and a lot of that comes from bad judgment.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.sentence: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.sentence: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.sentence: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.sentence: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.sentence: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.sentence: Permanence, perseverance and persistence in spite of all obstacles, discouragements, and impossibilities: It is this, that in all things distinguishes the strong soul from the weak.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.sentence: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.sentence: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.sentence: Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.sentence: Happiness can exist only in acceptance.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.sentence: Love has no age, no limit; and no death.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.sentence: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.sentence: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.sentence: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.sentence: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.sentence: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.sentence: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir

quotes.sentence: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.sentence: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.sentence: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.sentence: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.sentence: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.sentence: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.sentence: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.sentence: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.sentence: Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.sentence: When we are no longer able to change a situation - we are challenged to change ourselves.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.sentence: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.sentence: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.sentence: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.sentence: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.sentence: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.sentence: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.sentence: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.sentence: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.sentence: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.sentence: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.sentence: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.sentence: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.sentence: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.sentence: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.sentence: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.sentence: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.sentence: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.sentence: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.sentence: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.sentence: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.sentence: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling
